Components

Add to Favorites Button

This is the Add To Favorites component.

Add to favorites
.add-to-favorites--added
Button in "added" state.
Add to favorites
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/add-to-favorites') }}

<div class="add-to-favorites {{ modifier_class }}">
  <a href="#" class="add-to-favorites__link">
    {{ text|default('Add to favorites'|t) }}
  </a>
</div>

Average Rating

This is the average rating component.

Average Rating: 3 out of 5 stars

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/average-rating') }}

<div class="average-rating">
  <ul class="average-rating__stars" data-rating="{{ count }}">
    {% for i in 1..5 %}
      <li class="average-rating__star">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="30px" height="30px" viewBox="0 0 30 30">
          <polygon points="15,0 11.3,11.2 0,11.5 9,18.6 5.7,30 15,23.2 24.3,30 21,18.6 30,11.5 18.7,11.2 15,0 "/>
          <polyline points="15,5.2 17.2,11.7 17.5,12.8 18.7,12.8 25.5,13 20,17.4 19.1,18 19.4,19.1 21.4,25.9 16,21.9 
            15,21.2 14,21.9 8.6,25.9 10.6,19.1 10.9,18 10,17.4 4.5,13 11.3,12.8 12.5,12.8 12.8,11.7 15,5.2 "/>
        </svg>
      </li>
    {% endfor %}
  </ul>
    <p class="average-rating__text">{{ 'Average Rating:'|t }} {{ count }} {{ 'out of 5 stars'|t }}</p>
</div>

Button

This is the button component.

.button--primary
A button variation with strong styles.
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/button') }}

{# If an url value is provided render as a link #}
{% if button.url %}
  <a href="{{ button.url }}" class="button {{ modifier_class }}{{ classes|default('') }}">
    {{ button.text }}
  </a>
{# Otherwise render as a button. #}
{% else %}
  <button
    type="{{ button.type|default('submit') }}"
    class="button {{ modifier_class }}{{ classes|default('') }}">
    {{ button.text }}
  </button
{% endif %}

Eyebrow

This is the eyebrow component.

Action and Adventure

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/eyebrow') }}

<p class="eyebrow {{ classes|default('') }}">{{ eyebrow }}</p>

Featured Movie

This is the featured movie component.

BADCamp 2018

Be part of th 12th season this fall

Rated

PG13

6/10

Watch now
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/featured-movie') }}

<section class="featured-movie {{ attributes ? attributes.class }}"{{ attributes ? attributes|without(class) }}>
  {% if cover_image %}
    <div class="featured-movie__cover-image">
      {{ cover_image }}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
  {% if title or mpaa_rating or average_rating or promo_text or sypnosis %}
    <div class="featured-movie__meta">
      {% if title %}
        <div class="featured-image__title">
          {{ title_prefix }}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/heading/heading.twig' with {
                "heading": {
                  "title": title,
                  "heading_level": 1,
                  "url": ""
                }
              } only
            %}
          {{ title_suffix }}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if promo_text %}
        <div class="featured-movie__promo">
          {%
            include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
              "eyebrow": promo_text
            }
          %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if mpaa_rating %}
        <div class="featured-movie__mpaa-rating">
          <span>{{ 'Rated '|t }}</span>
          {%
            include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
              "eyebrow": mpaa_rating
            }
          %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if average_rating %}
      <div class="featured-movie__average-rating">
        {%
          include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
            "eyebrow": average_rating
          }
        %}
      </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if sypnosis %}
      <div class="featured-movie__synopsis">
        {{ sypnosis }}
      </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if watch_button or add_button %}
        <div class="featured-movie__ctas">
          {% if watch_button %}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/button/button.twig' with {
                "button": watch_button
              } only
            %}
          {% endif %}
          {% if add_button %}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/button/button.twig' with {
                "button": {
                  "text": add_button.text,
                  "classes": 'button--primary'
                }
              } only
            %}
          {% endif %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</section>

Heading

This is the heading component.

Back to being BAD

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/heading') }}

{# Default to h2 (heading level 2) if no heading level is supplied. #}
<h{{ heading.heading_level|default('2') }} class="heading {{ heading.classes ? ' ' ~ heading.classes }}
  {{- heading.attributes ? heading.attributes.class -}}"
  {{- heading.attributes ? heading.attributes|without(class) -}}>
  {% if heading.url %}
    <a href="{{ heading.url }}">{{ heading.title }}</a>
  {% else %}
    {{ heading.title }}
  {% endif %}
</h{{ heading.heading_level|default('2') }}>

Movie Card

This is the movie card component which represents a single movie in our app.

Movie title goes here

Add to favorites
PG-13

Average Rating: 3 out of 5 stars

Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur. Maecenas sed diam eget risus varius blandit sit amet non magna.
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/movie-card') }}

<article class="movie-card {{ attributes ? attributes.class }}"{{ attributes ? attributes|without(class) }}>
  {{ title_prefix }}
  {{ title_suffix }}
  {% if cover_image %}
    <div class="movie-card__cover-image">
      {{ cover_image }}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
  <div class="movie-card__content">
    {% if heading %}
      {%
        include '@nitflex_theme/heading/heading.twig' with {
          "heading": {
            "title": heading.title,
            "url": heading.url,
            "heading_level": heading.heading_level,
            "classes": 'movie-card__heading'
          }
        } only
      %}
    {% endif %}
    <div class="movie-card__favorites-toggle">
      {% block favorites_toggle %}
        {%
          include '@nitflex_theme/add-to-favorites/add-to-favorites.twig' with {
            url: '#',
          } only
        %}
      {% endblock %}
    </div>
    {% if mpaa_rating %}
      <div class="movie-card__mpaa-rating">
        {{ mpaa_rating }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if average_rating %}
      <div class="movie-card__average-rating">
        {% include '@nitflex_theme/average-rating/average-rating.twig' with {
            count: average_rating
          } only 
        %}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if synopsis %}
      <div class="movie-card__synopsis">
        {{ synopsis }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
</article>
